comments.body: This exception was added in #7927. I think the problem was that #7927 was written with only TorrentBroadcast in mind, in which case it's fine to throw a fatal exception because the task is doomed to fail anyways since it can't fetch the broadcast variable and can't recompute it.
comments.diffHunk:

-

-
-private[spark]
-case class BlockFetchException(messages: String, throwable: Throwable)
